case.title: Users are redirected to the Home page by clicking on the "Conduit" logo.
Users are redirected to the home page by clicking on "Home" link in the header..
Non-logged in users can see the articles of all users in the "Global feed" tab.
The articles are sorted from the newest to the oldest on the tab.
Users can see 10 articles on the page.
Users can be redirected to the 9th page by clicking 9 on the pagination menu.
Users can't rich the 51th page.
Users can see the avatar of the article's author.
Users are redirected to the user's page by clicking on the user's name link.
The date of certain article shows in the DD.TT.YYYY format.
Users are redirected to the Article page by clicking on the article's description.
Non-logged in users are redirected to the "sign in" page by clicking on the "like" button.
Non- logged in users can't "like" the article with the "like" button.
Users get articles that contain a certain tag by clicking on this tag.
Users can gets articles that contain a certain tag from the "Popular tags" section after clicking a tag from it.
Users can create an account by clicking on the "Need an account" link redirecting to the "Sign Up" page.
Users can sign in with a valid email.
Users can sign in if they already have an account.
The "Email" field contains a placeholder: Enter your username or email.
Users can use both the Upper and Lower register in the field.
If the user leaves the "Email" field blank, the message: “Email or Username: can’t be blank” appears.
Users can't log in with invalid credentials.
Users can sign in with a valid password.
Asterisks should cover the input of the "password" field.
Users is able to paste data into the field.
Users can't copy input from the field.
Users can't cut values from the field.
If the user leaves the field blank the message: “Password: can’t be blank” appears.
Users can sign in with a valid email and a valid password.
Users should be able to log in by clicking on the [Sign In] button.
Users should be able to log in by pressing the Enter button.
Users can't sign in if the account is not registered.
Users can't sign in with a valid email and an invalid password
Users can't sign in with an invalid email and a valid password.
Users can be redirected to "Sign In" page by clicking on "Have an account" link
Users can use Latin symbols in the "Username" field.
Users can use digit characters in the "Username" field.
Users can use both Upper and Lower register.
Users can input 3-40 characters into "Username" field.
Users can't use special characters.
Users can't use non-printing characters.
Users can't sign up with empty field.
Users can Sign Up with email which is [name]@[domain].[top-domain].
Users can use Latin letters in the [name] part of the email.
Users can use special characters: plus (+), hyphen (-), underline (_), dot (.)
Users can use digits in the "Email" field.
Users can't Sign Up with empty "Email" field.
Users can't use Cyrillic letters in the [name] part of email.
Users should use at least one capital letter.
Users should use at least one digit.
Users should use at least one special character.
The password field should contain more than 7 accepted symbols.
Users can't Sign Up with empty field.
Users can't use non-printing symbols.
The password field can't contain more than 30 accepted symbols.
Users can Sign up in case all required fields are field out correctly.
Users can't Sign Up if at least one required field is empty.
User can get the articles of the users which is following by him.
The list "you feed" is empty in case the user is not following another user.
Users are redirected to the "Article" page by clicking on the "Article's title" link.
Users are redirected to the "Article" page by clicking on the "Article's description" link.
Users are redirected to the "Article" page by clicking on the "read more" link.
Logged in users can like the article by clicking on the "like" button.
Users can unlike the article liked him before by clicking on the "like" button.
Users can create an article with unique title only.
In case of usage non-unique title the error message:" Article with the similar Title already exists. Do you want to continue?" appears.
Users can't create an article with empty field.
In case of empty "Article title" field the error message: "Title of the article can't be empty (minimum 5 symbols)" appears.
Users can create an article with the "Article title" field which consists of 5 symbols.
Users can create an article with the "Article title" field which consists of 240 symbols.
Users can't create an article with the "Article title" field which consists of 4 symbols.
Users can't create an article with the "Article title" field which consists of 241 symbols.
Users can use numbers.
Users can use special characters.
Users can use spaces inside of the title name
Users can't use the space like a first symbol.
Users can't use the space like a last symbol.
Users can't create an article with empty "Subtitle" field.
In case of empty field the error message: "Description of the article can't be empty (minimum 5 symbols)" appears.
Users can create an article with description which consist of 5 symbols.
Users can create an article with description which consist of 240 symbols.
Users can't create an article with description which consist of 4 symbols.
Users can't create an article with description which consist of 241 symbols.
Users can use numbers in the description.
Users can use special characters in the description.
Users can use spaces in the description.
Users can't use the space as a first symbol.
Users can't use the space as a last symbol.
Users can't create an article with empty body field.
In case of empty field the error message: "Body of article can't be blank" appears.
Users can create an article with body field which consist of 20 symbols.
Users can create an article with body field which consist of 9000 symbols.
Users can't create article with body which consist of 4 symbols.
Users can't create article with body which consist of 9001 symbols.
Users can't add any attachments.
Users can change the size of text with sliding down to the right corner of the text area.
Users can use numbers.
Users can use special characters.
Users can use spaces.
Users can create an article with empty tags field.
Users can use letters.
Users can use numbers.
Users can't use special characters.
Users can't use spaces.
Users can create a tag with 2 symbols.
Users can create tag with 30 symbols.
Users can't create tag with 1 symbol.
Users can't create a tag with 31 symbols.
Users can create up to 10 tags
Users can create a tag that begins from the "#" symbol.
Users can create a tag both with Upper and Lower case letters.
Users can create an article by clicking on the "Publish Article" button.
Users can create an article in case required fields are filled out.
The article vanishes in case of leaving the page by users without publication.
Users are redirected to the Article page after the successful publication.
Logged in users can be redirected to the "setting page by clicking on the "Settings" which is located in the header.
Non-logged in users are redirected to the Sign In page.
User can enter only one link into this field.
If the user's input is not a link, "URL of profile picture is invalid" error message appears
Users can update the settings with the blank "URL of profile pic" field.
Afetr the "URL of profile picture" field is updated, the new profile picture appears near the username in the upper right corner of the page.
In case the user leave the field empty, "Username can't be blank." error message appears.
Username field is unique.
Users can't update settings with username which consist of 3 symbols.
Users can update settings with username which consist of 4 symbols.
Users can update settings with username which consist of 36 symbols.
Users can't update settings with username which consist of 37 symbols.
Users can use Latin characters for the username field.
Users can't use Cyrillic letters for username field.
Users can't use number for the username field.
Users can't use spaces for username field.
Users can use "-" symbol in the username field.
Users can use "_" symbol in the username field.
Users can use both Upper and Lower case.
After the "Username" field is updated, the new username appears in the upper right corner of the page.
Users can update the settings with the blank "Short bio about you" field.
Users can update the settings with a body that consists of 9000 symbols.
Users can't update the settings with a body that consists of 9001 symbols.
Users can use letters in the "Body" field.
Users can use numbers in the Body field.
Users can use special characters in the Body field
Users can use spaces in the body field.
Users can't use the spaces like a first character.
Users can't use the spaces like the last character.
Users can't use a few spaces in a row.
After the "Short bio about you" field is updated, the new bio appears under the username on the user page
In case the user leaves the "email" field empty the error message: "Email can't be blank." appears.
The "email" field is unique.
The field format is:[name]@[domain].[top-domain].
The [name] section of the "email" field accept only Latin characters.
The [name] section of the "email" field doesn't accept Cyrillic characters.
The [name] section of the "email" field doesn't accept numbers.
The [name] section of the "email" field accepts "." symbol.
The [name] section of the "email" field accept "_" symbol.
The [name] section of the "email" field accept "+" symbol.
After the "Email" field is updated, a user can log in with the new email
After the "Email" field is updated, a user cannot log in with the old email.
Users can update the settings with the blank "New password" field.
After the "Password" field is updated, a user can log in with the new password
After the "Password" field is updated, a user cannot log in with the old password
Users can make input with 8 symbols.
Users can make input with 30 symbols.
Users can't make input with 7 symbols.
Users can't make input with 31 symbols.
Users can use letters in the "new password" field.
Users can use numbers in the "new password" field.
Users can use special characters in the "new password" field.
The "New password" field contains at least one capital letter.
The "New password" field contains at least number.
The "New password" field contains at least one special character.
The input of the field is covered by asterisks.
Users can update the settings when all require filled are filled out.

section.name: "Or click here to log out" button

case.title: Users are redirected to the Home page and is logged out after clicking the "Or click here to logout" button.
